description: Purchasing electrical products. Qualified bidders must pre-qualify on supply arrangement E60HN-16ELEC and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.
full_summary:
**W0125-24WR07 Electrical Materials**
==============================

**Notice Number:** WS4291017169
**Publication Date:** November 20, 2023
**Closing Date:** December 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites holdlers of Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC to submit a bid for the purchase of electrical products. Suppliers must be currently pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement to participate.

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

**Notice:**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Notice Status:** Expiration
* **Notice URL:** Not Available

**Bid Requirements:**

* Suppliers must have a valid Supply Arrangement for the supply of Electrical Products with PSPC.
* All bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on December 6, 2023.
* Only bids submitted within this timeframe will be evaluated.

**Projected Contract Dates:**

* **Start Date:** December 15, 2023
* **End Date:** Not Specified

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Terri Stork (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [terri.stork@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:terri.stork@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** Not Available
* **Fax:** Not Available

**Additional Information:**
This tender is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC only. Suppliers that do not have a valid supply arrangement are not eligible to participate. Interested suppliers should download the solicitation document from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) to learn more about the bidding process.

---

This notice has been translated in both English and French. If you require further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.
